    HVAC & Mechanical Building Services

    Design, install, and maintain HVAC and plumbing systems for commercial and residential buildings.

    Starts 2026-07-15 5 Weeks 15 seats left Engr. Kayode Balogun

    About this programme

    This 5-week programme is designed for mechanical engineers who want to specialise in building services. You'll learn the design, installation, and maintenance of HVAC systems, plumbing installations, fire protection systems, and mechanical ventilation for commercial and residential buildings. The programme covers heat load calculations, duct sizing, pipe sizing, equipment selection, and system commissioning. Participants visit active project sites to observe mechanical installations and gain practical experience in system troubleshooting and maintenance.

    Syllabus

    1. 1Week 1: HVAC Fundamentals & Heat Load Calculation
    2. 2Week 2: Duct & Pipe Sizing
    3. 3Week 3: Equipment Selection & System Design
    4. 4Week 4: Plumbing & Fire Protection Systems
    5. 5Week 5: Commissioning, Maintenance & Capstone
